news.title: Prediction: Rivian Will Soar Over the Next 3 Years. Here's 1 Reason Why.
news.content: Looking for high-upside stocks? Then Rivian Automotive ( NASDAQ: RIVN ) is for you. There are few stocks with this much potential upside over the next few years. news.title: Tesla Model Y Could Lose Bestselling Title In Europe To This Non-EV Car - Tesla  ( NASDAQ:TSLA )
news.content: The Tesla Model Y electric vehicle from Tesla Inc TSLA might not win title of Europe's bestselling vehicle for a second straight year, ending a short reign for electric vehicles. What Happened: The Model Y broke records for electric vehicles in 2023 and became the first EV to be the bestselling ...

news.title: LiveOne  ( NASDAQ: LVO )  Regains Compliance with Nasdaq Listing Requirements - LiveOne  ( NASDAQ:LVO ) , PodcastOne  ( NASDAQ:PODC )

news.content: Benzinga readers pick which Magnificent 7 stock could have the best performance if there is a Santa Claus rally to close 2024 and kickstart 2025. What Happened: The majority of the Magnificent 7 stocks have outperformed the S&P 500 year-to-date in 2024.
